title: Rgm in new client
body: How do i play the RGM game modes in the new client. I missed ascension this entire weekend and didn't even know about it.

replies.body:
Rotating Game Modes haven't made it to the new client yet, but you can always launch into the Legacy Client to play them until they've been brought to the Beta Client. At the login screen, there's a button you can press to launch into the Legacy client, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
ok thanks for replying to my question
